note.text: If your counterparts request something that is not feasible, try not to directly reject their request. Doing so may be perceived as rude. Instead, tell your counterparts that you’ll make an effort.

However, don’t make promises or suggest that you will provide something you aren’t sure you can provide. Failing to deliver something you promised can cause serious damage to your relationships with your counterparts. It’s best to underpromise and overdeliver.
